original_text: who have swerved from the truth, saying that the resurrection has already happened. They are upsetting the faith of some.
korean_text: 진리에 관하여는 그들이 그릇되었도다 부활이 이미 지나갔다 함으로 어떤 사람들의 믿음을 무너뜨리느니라

sentences.original_text: who have swerved from the truth
saying that the resurrection has already happened.
They are upsetting the faith of some.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 어떤 사람들의 믿음을 무너뜨리고 있습니다
